name: marreta
tagline: A self-hosted tool for storing encrypted password backups
description: Marreta is a self-hosted tool for managing password backups as encrypted files. Itâ€™s designed for simple offline storage and retrieval of credentials in a secure manner, accessible via a minimal UI.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Store passwords and credentials in encrypted files for secure offline access

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Create and manage multiple encrypted backup files of your password database

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Minimal web UI for adding, editing, and retrieving stored credentials

features.title: Master Password
features.description: Single master password protects all stored credentials with strong encryption

features.title: Export Functionality
features.description: Download encrypted backup files for storage on external media or cloud

features.title: Import Capability
features.description: Restore credentials from previously exported encrypted backup files

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find specific credentials by service name or username
